name: Treasure N' Bones
description:
Deep underground lies a dungeon bursting with gold. Five brave skeletons enter the dungeon but who will come out rich?

Randomize their names, or write your own and watch them go!

They automatically move on their own and make their own decisions, who knows what they might do!

The gold they find can be used to buy new modes, modifiers, and shortcuts to help them out!

Complete feats to unlock HATS!
